name: ping
description: Send ICMP ECHO_REQUEST to network hosts.

name: nmap
description: Network exploration tool and security / port scanner.

name: netstat
description: Print network connections, routing tables, interface statistics, masquerade connections, and multicast memberships.

name: ipconfig
description: Display current TCP/IP network configuration values.

name: whois
description: Client for the whois directory service.

name: traceroute
description: Print the route packets trace to network host.

name: metasploit
description: Advanced open-source platform for developing, testing, and using exploit code.

name: aircrack-ng
description: WEP and WPA-PSK keys cracking program.
